n she landed and let her signature appear, she hoped that Dark Rodimus coul=
d track her

us










        












Tucson's reply comes back to Nightlight b=
ut in a rather meaningful way.
" Master Yokitron always told me to have a g=
reat respect for fate and where it takes your companions and yourself." I r=
espect your wishes and I will see that Elita is safe and that no hand will =
ever come to harm her. But most of all, be careful and best of luck followi=
ng the road that fate has shown you as it shows everyone when destiny calls=
 you forth."

Nightlight smiled and took the=
 quills, she did a large look at ELita and quickly left. While she walks ow=
ards the Exit. While she was reaching the exit nighlight typed a highly enc=
oded message at Tucson "I'm looking for Rodimus... Take care of elita, and =
trust in what I'll do"

o.com

ned.

Nightlight.  She then plucks a few quills from her armor and gives them to =

ust on case things go south.

 nighlight:
 
Nightlight s=
miled and said  while she glenty touched elita"It's what i needed to know, =
please stay with her... i would ask Nightshift care her if he was here"
 
"=
What's happening mom?"said Elite with yawn
 
"all will be all right, my dea=
r"said Nighlight"sleep"
 Elita felt sleep once more, Nightlight kissed her =
and she stood up and slowly left the room To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

magicquartz@...

ssons to be Learned.










        












Straight Shot carries a=
 worried expression on her face as she looks down to Elita, gently stroking=
 her fur with a tender hand.
" She's in very good hands Nightlight.  Of cou=
rse I'll be sure she has someone ta take good care of her.  And you should =
see how Tucson interacts with her.  Once he holds her, he's not about ta pu=
t her down too fast.  And despite his temper, he's a real softy when it com=
es ta being around youngsters Elita's age.  I know what he's gonna do if he=
 and Talon have ta adopt Elita, he's gonna spoil her rotten.  All dads wann=
a spoil their kids, especially if they consider them " Daddy's little girl.=
"
"Look at me, I wanna do the same thing, I just wanna hold her and never l=
et go.   And if anyone is gonna make phenomenal parents it's Talon and Tucs=
on.  I know how much it would mean ta both of them ta have a young bot look=
 up to them and depend on them for guidance and protection, because that's =
what parents do and I know a great pair of parents when I see them."
She sm=
iles to Talon as she makes her last statement.

 constantly busy.

Straight Shot enters the room w=
ith Talon and is careful not to wake Elita.  She smiles while looking to Ni=
ghtlight and the cub.
" I can just see it now, all of us together, watching=
 the young bots develop Their skills together..  Elita would really love ta=
 have someone ta pal around with.  I bet in the near future that will happe=
n.  And Nightlight, don't worry, Ticson is out there looking for Wheelie an=
d I bet he'll find Rodimus too.  I got ta thinking about things and I reali=
zed that the shell program was long since gone a while ago.   I bet that Da=
rk Rodimus is a copy of the real Rodimus.  And if they're out there, Tucson=
 will find them.  Isn't that right, Talon?"

nstantly busy.

Nightshift thinks for a moment. If anything, Tucso=
n would rely on ground tracking to find Wheelie.  
" Most likely his field =
track'n tactics.  That means he's gonna land at the area and attempt ta fol=
low Wheelie on foot.  He knows how ta identify a bot just by foot and tire =
tracks alone. One more thing, he's got sharp senses and he was promised he'=
d be able ta go it alone.  Get downwind of him and he won't be too happy.  =
Even I know better then ta mess with him."


Perpetually on the move and co=
nstantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 6:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@=
gmail.com> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      > <OLD>

>

> Nightsh=
ift nods to Leo's request.

>

> " School will have ta open a little later =
than expected.  Okay Leo, I'm on

> it."

>

> He transforms into SUV mode =
and rolls off toward Polar Claw.

>

> " Hey Leo, ya might wanna make sure =
Tucson doesn't see ya!  He gets wind

> that you didn't let em do that miss=
ion on his own, he's gonna see that as an

> act of distrust.  Then he's re=
ally gonna be in a bad mood.  Trust me, I

> know.  Ratchet was the same wa=
y.  Like dad like son."



<NEW>



"I know." LEO PRIME said over the radio=
 "But sometimes things are far

more important than his anger."



When NIG=
HTSHIFT arrived at POLAR CLAW's location he was already

standing with RAMU=
LUS and the group's tactical expert PROWL, they were

all in robot mode sta=
nding at the shuttle.



WOLFGANG was standing off to the side manipulating=
 something. "Its

fueled up and ready to go." WLFGANG said as he stowed an =
energon

dispensing unit in its holster.



"Good!" POLAR CLAW said. he was=
 easily the largest of the group. While

not as tall as RODIMUS or TUSCON w=
ere, he was still broad and massive,

giving he appearance of great size an=
d ferocity.



POLAR CLAW turned to look at NIGHTSHIFT, "You're here becaus=
e you know

Tuscon better than we." There was a dismissive grunt as he glan=
ced at

a PADD he had in his hand, it is ohviously the notes and mission

p=
arameters he recieved from LEO PRIME.



"He's gone out alone. Sensors show=
ed that he was going off in the

direction of that jungle where Rodimus is =
suppose to be." There was

another pause from POLAR CLAW, "The same directi=
on Wheelie took as

well."



POLAR CLAW lowered his padd as he looked at N=
IGHTSHIFT, "Every scan we

have of that place shows it is a dense jungle, h=
is inhanced senses

will not help him much there. What tactic do you think =
he will use to

locate Wheelie?"

 likely his field track'n tactics.  That means he's gonna land at the =

>=
<br>
> Nightshift nods to Leo's request.<br>
><br>
> " School will=
 have ta open a little later than expected.  Okay Leo, I'm on<br>
> it."=
<br>
><br>
> He transforms into SUV mode and rolls off toward Polar C=
law.<br>
><br>
> " Hey Leo, ya might wanna make sure Tucson doesn't s=
ee ya!  He gets wind<br>
> that you didn't let em do that mission on his=
 own, he's gonna see that as an<br>
> act of distrust.  Then he's really=
 gonna be in a bad mood.  Trust me, I<br>
> know.  Ratchet was the same =
way.  Like dad like son."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
"I know." LEO PRIME=
 said over the radio "But sometimes things are far<br>
more important than =
his anger."<br>
<br>
When NIGHTSHIFT arrived at POLAR CLAW's location he wa=
s already<br>
standing with RAMULUS and the group's tactical expert PROWL, =
they were<br>
all in robot mode standing at the shuttle.<br>
<br>
WOLFGANG =
was standing off to the side manipulating something. "Its<br>
fueled up and=
 ready to go." WLFGANG said as he stowed an energon<br>
dispensing unit in =
its holster.<br>
<br>
"Good!" POLAR CLAW said. he was easily the largest of=
 the group. While<br>
not as tall as RODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still b=
road and massive,<br>
giving he appearance of great size and ferocity.<br>
=
<br>
POLAR CLAW turned to look at NIGHTSHIFT, "You're here because you know=
<br>
Tuscon better than we." There was a dismissive grunt as he glanced at<=
br>
a PADD he had in his hand, it is ohviously the notes and mission<br>
pa=
rameters he recieved from LEO PRIME.<br>
<br>
"He's gone out alone. Sensors=
 showed that he was going off in the<br>
direction of that jungle where Rod=
imus is suppose to be." There was<br>
another pause from POLAR CLAW, "The s=
ame direction Wheelie took as<br>
well."<br>
<br>
POLAR CLAW lowered his pa=
dd as he looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every scan we<br>
have of that place shows =
it is a dense jungle, his inhanced senses<br>
will not help him much there.=
 What tactic do you think he will use to<br>
locate Wheelie?"<br>
